page.title: 17PLAYGROUPS
page.content: {CATHOLIC HALL PLAYGROUP} There are several Playgroups in Wymondham. These cater for children from the age of 3 years until school age. In general the Playgroup aims to get small children used to being part of a group and used to being away from their mothers for part of the day. On an average morning there is a period of free play to begin with, followed by a period of more organized activity with the children sitting round tables drawing or making things from old packets and cartons. Then they are given milk to drink and a biscuit, and this is followed by a story. In the summer months the children can play outside on the climbing frame or in the sandpit. The Playgroup is open from 9.15 a.m. to 12.00 noon every weekday during school term-time.
